channel.title: Connecting to Update Server?
channel.description:
Every time I open up a client it starts loading.. Then it stops at "Connecting to Update Server".
This just happened suddenly, I didn't touch any kind of setting with my computer, and all of a sudden.. None of my Clients want to work for me and it's very frustrating.
Please Help! :(

item.title: Connecting to Update Server?
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Uhm usually means that the IP is invalid if 500+

uhm well basicly you’re client is stuffed, turn on the Server First uhm thats all the Advice I can give you for now

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting to Update Server?
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Try running a client via webclient, like silabsoft one, might have something to do with the cache being corrupted in c:/Windows,

Not sure.

Read full topic
